triples.name: Hypergraph
triples.relevance: The primary subject of the survey - hypergraphs generalize graphs to allow edges connecting multiple vertices.

triples.name: Network analysis
triples.relevance: Core methodology for investigating structural properties and patterns in higher-order networks.

triples.name: Data mining
triples.relevance: The overall task of hypergraph mining - extracting patterns and structural properties from hypergraph data.

triples.name: Null model
triples.relevance: Statistical tool used to test the significance of observed patterns in hypergraphs.

triples.name: Transitive relation
triples.relevance: Mathematical concept used for computing transitivity as a structural quantity in hypergraph analysis.
